meanings.definition: The quality of being able to explode or cause an explosion.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks displayed their explosiveness in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The explosiveness of the volcano was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The cake's frosting had an unexpected explosiveness when bitten into.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an explosiveness that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The car's engine roared with an explosiveness that startled everyone nearby.

meanings.definition: The state of being highly energetic or dynamic.
meanings.sent1: The dancer's performance was full of explosiveness and passion.
meanings.sent2: The team's explosiveness on the field led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's tail wagged with such explosiveness that it knocked over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice had an explosiveness that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with an explosiveness of activity and chatter.
